column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Marlyce - Thanks for your review. I'm sorry if you may have felt rushed during service. That is wholly unacceptable
column2: and I will be speaking to our servers about this in the near future. I will say as high-volume
column4: we do tend to move at a quick pace
column5: mostly to keep the wait times as minimal as possible. You had mentioned only waiting 15 minutes rather than the quoted 25 minutes. Regardless
column6: we are very appreciative of your visit
column7: and we hope to serve you again in the near future.
